name: R/C Car City Parking: eXtreme Radio Controlled Buggy Racing Stunt Simulator Game PRO
name_original: R/C Car City Parking: eXtreme Radio Controlled Buggy Racing Stunt Simulator Game PRO
description:
Charge up your batteries and get ready to tear it up in this R/C Car simulator. Drive as fast as you can in the city streets. Watch out for cars though, don’t get flattened. Make it to the end and park your buggy if you can.

!!NO ADS!!!

Features
-Awesome 3D Graphics
-Different configurations to choose from
-Realistic Physics
-Dynamic Traffic
